name: vitaSnake GMS2
description:
This is a port of Grzybojad's original vitaSnake for PlayStation Vita to GameMaker Studio 2.

For now the only supported versions are for Windows, Linux, and Android, others are provided purely for fun, and I have no idea if they actually work, especially the macOS/iOS version which is in progress right now.

Trailer: YouTube.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - move in menu/move the snake

Space/Shift - "Turbo" button

Escape - Pause

On Android menu is touch controllable, "Back" key is Pause.

Gamepads are also supported, (A) is select and (B) is back.
